objects.text:
46dB Hybrid Active Noise Cancellation
360° Spatial Audio Experience
12.4mm Dynamic Bass Driver
Up to 40 Hours Battery Life

product_details.name: realme Buds T310 True Wireless in-Ear Earbuds with 46dB Hybrid ANC, 360° Spatial Audio, 12.4mm Dynamic Bass Driver, Upto 40Hrs Battery and Fast Charging (Vibrant Black)

banner_details:
The banner presents a modern, tech-themed advertisement for wireless earbuds, highlighted by a sleek futuristic style. It features a dark geometric background with diagonal strokes and circular overlays to create depth. The top section showcases a bold digital-style heading (`heading_1` and `heading_2`) with vibrant cyan and white colors. Below that, a subheading (`subheading`) introduces the product brand in cyan. The feature description text (`description`) is aligned left in a simple sans-serif font, enhancing readability. A large bold price tag (`price`) in white captures attention at the center-left. A cyan button rectangle (`cta_background`) with a dark "SHOP NOW" CTA text (`cta`) adds an urgent buying action. To the right, a high-resolution product image (`product_image`) highlights the earbuds with realistic lighting effects.

**Color Palette:**
- Background Black: `#121212`
- Accent Cyan: `#00D8FF`
- Charcoal Gray: `#1E1E1E`
- Teal Blue: `#005670`
- Pure White: `#FFFFFF`
- CTA Text Dark: `#121212`
product_color: The product image features a sleek and modern aesthetic centered around a matte charcoal black finish. The dominant color is a deep, metallic charcoal gray (#2E2E2E), giving the product a premium and sophisticated look. Subtle gradients and soft lighting highlight contours and reflections, creating a sense of depth and precision. Accents such as the minor reflections on the earbuds and case use lighter gray tones (#555555) to add contrast, while the brand logo appears in a dull silver gray (#A3A3A3), standing out yet harmonizing with the darker base. A small LED light in green (#76FF91) provides a minimal but effective color pop.
